name: All Hallow's Harvest
description:
Originally created for Ludum Dare 45 with the theme "Start with Nothing"

This Halloween season get your pumpkin patch moving by selling in Bulk! The more pumpkins you can sell at a time the better.

Controls: 

Left mouse click to place pumpkins, right mouse click to rotate before placing. 

Use the buttons on the bottom to sell pumpkins and buy vine removal services, any set of 3 connected will be sold with a multiplier for how many different kinds of pumpkins are sold at a time.

Music & Sound by Ben Ash
